1.name: Face

serviceItemList.name: Skin Tightening Facial
serviceItemList.information: Firms up Skin and Refines Pores - VLCC Skin Tightening Facial helps in reducing fine lines and wrinkles while delivering a firming effect. It naturally heals the skin, tightens the pores and provides a smooth and supple effect to the skin

serviceItemList.name: Instaglow Facial
serviceItemList.information: Makes Skin Soft and Glowing - VLCC Instaglow facial provides instant glow to your skin leaving it fairer, radiant and nourished.

serviceItemList.name: Fruit Facial
serviceItemList.information: Unclogs Pores and Fades Scar - This unique VLCC Fruit Facial lightens your blemishes, minimizes enlarged pores and fades superficial pigmentation. It also provides even skin tone and fairer complexion.

serviceItemList.name: Anti-Tan Facial
serviceItemList.information: Fades Tan - VLCC Anti-Tan Facial helps fading the sun tan and leaves skin softer, fairer, radiant and moisturised.

serviceItemList.name: Lotus Whiteglow Facial
serviceItemList.information: Lotus Whiteglow Facial lightens skin tone by treating pigmentation at the root. It reduces uneven pigmentation and whitens skin naturally by diminishing dark spots.

serviceItemList.name: Radiant Pearl Facial
serviceItemList.information: Lotus Radiant Pearl Facial controls melanin production and gradually makes the skin look whiter and brighter.

serviceItemList.name: Radiant Diamond Facial
serviceItemList.information: Lotus Radiant Diamond Facial contains exfoliating cleanser that penetrate deep into the fine layers of skin making it soft and rejuvenated. It consists of a brilliant peeling extract which tenderly uproots cosmetics and pollution, leaving skin hydrated and young.

serviceItemList.name: Radiant Gold Facial
serviceItemList.information: Lotus Radiant Gold Facial contains radiant gold exfoliating cleanser. It boosts radiance and brightens the skin through deep cleansing. It is filled with papaya and horse chestnut extracts which helps in removing rashes and irritation providing flawless, smooth and clear skin.

serviceItemList.name: O3+ Seaweed Facial
serviceItemList.information: O3+ Seaweed Facial is suitable for normal to oily skin and is recommended for acne prone skin. O3+ Seaweed Facial comprises of Seaweed Cleansing Gel, Seaweed Tonic, Seaweed Serum, Seaweed Cream and Seaweed Mask. It brightens your skin and fades marks.

serviceItemList.name: O3+ Whitening Facial
serviceItemList.information: O3+ Whitening Facial is best for skin whitening and pigmentation control. It comprises Of Whitening Cleansing Foam, Whitening Tonic, Whitening Serum, Whitening Cream and Whitening Mask and is suitable for all skin types.

serviceItemList.name: Hydravitals Cleanup
serviceItemList.information: Lotus Hydravitals Cleanup imparts a healthy glow to your face. It is very good to keep blemishes, blackheads and minor imperfections of your skin away.

serviceItemList.name: Under Arms
serviceItemList.information: VLCC has a luxurious range of bleach that makes your skin tan go away and offers an instant glow and polish to the skin. Range includes Oxy, Herbal and Gold. Each of them match the skin tone perfectly and purifies the skin from within to make it fairer, energized and youthful.

serviceItemList.name: Under Arms
serviceItemList.information: The O3+ Meladerm Vitamin C Gel Bleach Cream has excellent properties of lightening skin & hair without making the skin dry. It is peroxide free, hence does not irritate the skin. Enriched with Amonia Pursulphate which works like a micro sponge to retain hydration level.

1.metaDescription: Premium facial,threading and bleach service right at your doorstep
1.metaKeyword: salon at home, facial,waxing at home
1.captionHeading: For best impression at first sight
1.caption: Add gleam to your face with skilled threading ,facial,bleach
1.serviceDescription: <p>Its true that facial skin is different from other body skin and requires utter care. you should employ facial and bleach under expert care to keep it young and scintillating, facial not only cleans, exfoliates and nourishes the skin, but also makes the complexion well-hydrated to make the skin look younger. while bleach can lighten up their skin that have been affected by discolouration and pigmentation issues.</p><p>Lookplex professionals understand the quirks of all sort of your skin and take extra care in handling the same. With a Lookplex professional, a facial beauty begins with a consultation like asking questions about your skin concerns, diet, your water intake etc. These can affect your skin and what kind of treatments she recommends. </p><p>After wrapping your hair with a towel or headband, the professional begins the facial with a thorough cleansing, using cotton pads. Unlike others, we relax your face to soften up any blackheads and whiteheads to be extracted. This is followed by a facial mask and then advice on home skin care.</p><p>Although it varies from person to person, one should get a facial done once a month. Moreover, whenever there is a season change, it is recommended that you go for a facial.</p>

3.metaDescription: Skilled Hair experts at your doorstep.

3.captionHeading: Let you Hair style and color define you
3.caption: Hair spa to boost your hair health
3.serviceDescription: <p>Have you tried all sort of shampoos and hair oil with no aid to hair fall and split ends?Then, Hair spa is likely your solution, it not only strengthen your hairs from root but  also solves problems like dandruff, hair loss, rough and dull hair. Hair spa helps in conditioning the scalp, circulates blood, gives relaxation and makes hair follicles stronger.It re-hydrates the scalp  and prevent excessive oil secretion.</p><p>We have highly experienced pool of hair experts having multitude of experience be it new trendy hairstyle, hair spa ,hair cut ,or hair color, Hair experts from Lookplex, we make sure that the spa you receive is the best possible solution to your hair condition. we deliver all hair expertise right at  your home. Get ready to witness the unparalleled salon experience right at your doorstep.</p>
3.serviceDescriptionHeading: Premium hair spa, haircut and hair styles at your doorstep.
